evidence.title: Technique(s) used to elucidate/verify the structure

location.title: Location of the domain within the gene (in AAs)

mut_pheno.title: Knockout mutation phenotype for this gene, if known

end.title: End coordinate of the exon, in nt

start.title: Start coordinate of the exon, in nt

enum: Gene expression correlated with compound production

minimal.title: if the entry contains no experimental data

lipid_moiety.title: Lipid moiety attached to the peptide

aa_subcluster.title: Genes responsible for biosynthesis of the specificity, if within this gene cluster

c_dom_subtype.title: Subtype of condensation domain in this module

cyclases.title: Gene(s) in cluster involved in folding and cyclization of the aromatic polyketide

nr_iterations.title: Number of chain synthesis iterations performed by iterative PKS module

domains.title: Core PKS domains present in this module

pks_mod_doms.title: Nonreductive scaffold-modifying domain in this module

pufa_modification_domains.title: Non-reductive scaffold-modifying domain in this synthase

trans_at.title: Genes in cluster encoding trans-acyltransferases (without ketosynthase domains)

publications.title: Key publications associated with this gene cluster, pathway or molecule

cleavage_recogn_site.title: Amino acid sequence(s) of cleavage recognition site(s), if known. If multiple, separate by commas.

core_sequence.title: RiPP core peptide amino acid sequence(s)

first_AA.title: Position of first amino acid involved

second_AA.title: Position of second amino acid involved

recognition_motif.title: Recognition motif in leader peptide for modification peptide

precursor_genes.title: Genes in cluster encoding RiPP precursor peptides

items.title: Gene ids for sugar biosynthesis, if within this gene cluster

carbon_count_subclass.title: Terpene subclass by number of carbon units

structural_subclass.title: Terpene subclass by structure, if applicable
